comments.author: Yabes
comments.body: Admin/Moderators only ensure threads are organized and free from spam.Posts will not be deleted unless you broke those rules, Please make sure to post constructive things.Posting same thoughts double or more repeatedly only same value, and it can definitely be considered as spam.If you already post a things, please don't post same things.
